name: Flo Limone
description: Flo Limone is Colorado Seed’s twist on a cannabis classic. Flo, the 1996 Cannabis Cup winner known for its light and bright buzz, is crossed against Nina Limone (Super Lemon Haze x Rebel God Smoke) to create an outstanding, full-flavored sativa that is motivating without an aggressive raciness. The terpene profile has also been described as aroma therapeutic, with notes of citrus incense intermixed with Moroccan hash.
attributes_title: Happy, Focused, Relaxed, Creative, Giggly, Lack of Appetite, Fatigue, Insomnia, Pain, Stress
